replies.body:
Do not make threads on the forums when you're banned. (Decreases your chances). Publicly telling people that you'll attempt to ban evade is not good for you, unless you don't want to get unbanned. Be patient with the staff and actually appeal your punishment so they can look at it and make up their minds (Staff is very considerate with players so they'll show great amount of understanding). 

  Also to all those guys swearing and all, we could've explained it simply to him so he wouldn't have continued.
